summary: WITHIN 4 MONTHS FOLLOWING THE LAST TWO OIL CHANGES, THE LOW OIL PRESSURE LIGHT WILL COME ON WHILE DRIVING.  OIL IS TWO QTS LOW.  NO INDICATION OF LEAK, BURNING OR IN RADIATOR.  NOT SURE WHY USING OIL WITH NO INDICATION.  MECHANIC STATES IT IS NORMAL TO USE OIL AND NEEDS TO BE ADDED BETWEEN OIL CHANGES.
